TopicTitle: Has something strange happened to the Daily Kerbal forum

Articles.Content:
The default sort order of the Daily Kerbal forum appears to have changed.

I haven't explicitly changed the sort order and the current order neither has a marker indicating the sort column nor does it appear to actually be sorted by any of the available columns.

All of the other forums (well, I haven't checked all of them, but certainly all the ones I have checked) are sorted by "Last Post By" descending by default...

Edit: It has been pointed out to me that the threads are in original posting order which makes some sense for this particular forum though I have never actually noticed it before. Has it been changed recently or was it always like this?

Edited November 13, 2014 by Padishar

Always like that (or it changed within two weeks of the dailies becoming a thing). Stops older threads taking the limelight.

Kinda wish they'd added tags for that forum so you could filter by which type of daily you were looking for.
